properties.name: management.endpoint.nacosconfig.cache.time-to-live
properties.description: Maximum time that a response can be cached.

properties.name: management.endpoint.nacosconfig.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable the nacosconfig endpoint.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.access-key
properties.description: access key for namespace.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.cluster-name
properties.description: nacos config cluster name.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.config-long-poll-timeout
properties.description: nacos get config long poll timeout.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.config-retry-time
properties.description: nacos get config failure retry time.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.context-path
properties.description: context path for nacos config server.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.enable-remote-sync-config
properties.description: If you want to pull it yourself when the program starts to get the configuration for the first time, and the registered Listener is used for future configuration updates, you can keep the original code unchanged, just add the system parameter: enableRemoteSyncConfig = "true" ( But there is network overhead); therefore we recommend that you use {@link ConfigService#getConfigAndSignListener} directly.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.enabled
properties.description: enable nacos config or not.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.encode
properties.description: default encode for nacos config content.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.endpoint
properties.description: endpoint for Nacos, the domain name of a service, through which the server address can be dynamically obtained.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.extension-configs
properties.description: a set of extensional configurations .e.g: spring.cloud.nacos.config.extension-configs[0]=xxx .

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.file-extension
properties.description: the suffix of nacos config dataId, also the file extension of config content, only support properties now.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.group
properties.description: nacos config group, group is config data meta info.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.max-retry
properties.description: nacos maximum number of tolerable server reconnection errors.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.name
properties.description: nacos config dataId name.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.namespace
properties.description: namespace, separation configuration of different environments.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.password
properties.description: nacos config service's password to authenticate.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.prefix
properties.description: the prefix of dataId, nacos config data meta info. dataId = prefix + '-' + ${spring.active.profile} + `.` + ${spring.cloud.nacos.config.file-extension}.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.refresh-enabled
properties.description: the master switch for refresh configuration, it default opened(true).

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.secret-key
properties.description: secret key for namespace.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.server-addr
properties.description: nacos config server address.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.shared-configs
properties.description: a set of shared configurations .e.g: spring.cloud.nacos.config.shared-configs[0]=xxx .

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.timeout
properties.description: timeout for get config from nacos.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.username
properties.description: nacos config service's userName to authenticate.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.password
properties.description: nacos password to authenticate.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.server-addr
properties.description: nacos server address.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.username
properties.description: nacos userName to authenticate.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.ext-config
properties.description: a set of extended configurations .

deprecation.reason: replaced to NacosConfigProperties#extensionConfigs and not use it at the same time .

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.refreshable-dataids
properties.description: refreshable dataids , multiple separated by commas .Not providing support,the need to refresh is specified by the respective refresh configuration.

deprecation.reason: replaced to NacosConfigProperties#sharedConfigs and not use it at the same time.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.shared-dataids
properties.description: the dataids for configurable multiple shared configurations , multiple separated by commas .

deprecation.reason: replaced to NacosConfigProperties#sharedConfigs and not use it at the same time.
